 void DataHandler.deleteTaskForUser(User user, Task task)

 boolean WebClient.saveTaskForUser(User user, Task task)
          If the provided task object has no URI, this function will post a request with the server to create a new task, receive a reply with the assigned URI, and store in on the database.
 void DataHandler.saveTaskForUser(User user, Task task)
          This non-blocking method will create/edit a task on the web server, and if succesul it will also create/edit the task record on the local database.
